name: And Will Do So Once More

description.value: You've learned how to let go of most worries and move past them. The trigger for All This Will Happen Again instead becomes, "You fail or critically fail a Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saving throw." You still can use All This Will Happen Again only once per day.
